Package com.back.isobus

Class CanBUS_socket

java.lang.Object
com.back.isobus.CanBUS_socket
@Component
public class CanBUS_socket
extends java.lang.Object
Class for opening and closing CAN bus interfaces and sending and receiving frames over the bus. It uses JNI wrapper to access C code and manage easily the CAN socket.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CanBUS_socket()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canClose​(int fd)
    Closes a CAN socket if it is already opened.
    boolean canDelete​(java.lang.String can_interface)
    Delete the specified CAN interface executing a bash script.
    boolean canInit​(java.lang.String can_interface, int bitrate)
    Executes a bash script which initializes a real CAN bus interface with an specified bitrate (ISOBUS, for example has a default baudrate of 250kb/s).
    boolean canInitV​(java.lang.String can_interface)
    Executes a bash script which initializes a virtual CAN bus interface with an specified bitrate.
    int canOpenRaw​(java.lang.String can_interface)
    Opens a CAN socket using RAW protocol.
    boolean canReceiveFrame​(int fd, FrameCAN frame_obj)
    Receives a CAN bus frame.
    boolean canSendFrame​(int fd, FrameCAN frame_obj)
    Sends a frame over a CAN bus interface using a FrameCAN object.
    boolean canSendFrame​(int fd, java.lang.String full_frame)
    Sends a frame over a CAN bus interface using an String.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listCanDevices()
    List every active CAN and virtual CAN device using "ip link show" system command.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CanBUS_socket

      public CanBUS_socket()

  • Method Details

    • canOpenRaw

      public int canOpenRaw​(java.lang.String can_interface)
      Opens a CAN socket using RAW protocol.
      Parameters:
      can_interface - CAN socket to open.
      Returns:
      Returns the file descriptor or -1 if it could not be opened.

    • canClose

      public boolean canClose​(int fd)
      Closes a CAN socket if it is already opened.
      Parameters:
      fd - File descriptor of the active CAN socket.
      Returns:
      Returns true if closing was successful or false if it can not be closed.

    • canReceiveFrame

      public boolean canReceiveFrame​(int fd, FrameCAN frame_obj)
      Receives a CAN bus frame.
      Parameters:
      fd - File descriptor of the CAN socket instantiated.
      frame_obj - Datatype in which the frame is stored.
      Returns:
      False if an error occurs or True if a CAN frame is receiver successfully.

    • canSendFrame

      public boolean canSendFrame​(int fd, FrameCAN frame_obj)
      Sends a frame over a CAN bus interface using a FrameCAN object.
      Parameters:
      fd - File descriptor of the active CAN socket.
      frame_obj - Datatype containing the ISOBUS CAN frame.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the frame has been successfully sent or false if an error occurs.

    • canSendFrame

      public boolean canSendFrame​(int fd, java.lang.String full_frame)
      Sends a frame over a CAN bus interface using an String.
      Parameters:
      fd - File descriptor of the active CAN socket.
      full_frame - String containing the frame.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the frame has been successfully sent or false if an error occurs.

    • canInit

      public boolean canInit​(java.lang.String can_interface, int bitrate)
      Executes a bash script which initializes a real CAN bus interface with an specified bitrate (ISOBUS, for example has a default baudrate of 250kb/s).
      Parameters:
      can_interface - CAN interface to initialize.
      bitrate - Bitrate specified to initialize the interface.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the initialization of the CAN bus was successful or false if an error occurs.

    • canInitV

      public boolean canInitV​(java.lang.String can_interface)
      Executes a bash script which initializes a virtual CAN bus interface with an specified bitrate.
      Parameters:
      can_interface - Virtual CAN interface to initialize.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the initialization of the CAN bus was successful or false if an error occurs.

    • listCanDevices

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listCanDevices()
      List every active CAN and virtual CAN device using "ip link show" system command.
      Returns:
      Returns every CAN interface or -1 if an error occurs.

    • canDelete

      public boolean canDelete​(java.lang.String can_interface)
      Delete the specified CAN interface executing a bash script.
      Parameters:
      can_interface - CAN interface to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the interface was successfully deleted or false if an error occurred.
